snippet: At the first adults-only sleepover at the Museum of Natural History, 150 people paid for the chance to fulfill their childhood fantasies.
abstract: American Museum of Natural History in Manhattan holds its first adults-only sleepover, and 150 people pay for the chance to fulfill their childhood fantasies; guests sleep on cots under blue whale in hall of ocean life.
lead_paragraph: At the first adults-only sleepover at the Museum of Natural History, 150 people paid for the chance to fulfill their childhood fantasies.

headline.seo: At Museum of Natural History in New York, an Adults-Only Sleepover
headline.main: A Night of Dinosaurs and Stargazing (No Children Allowed)
headline.print_headline: A Museum Sleepover With Some Dinosaurs (Children Stayed Home)
